tool_description: Experience the quickest Minecraft API available! Obtain essential Minecraft Server Information, Minecraft Player Details, Minecraft Player Avatars, and more, all without worrying about Mojang rate limits.
name: Minecraft API
title: Minecraft API

api_list.name: Get Player Avatar by Username / UUID
api_list.description: Get a Minecraft Player's Avatar (Face) with their Minecraft Username or UUID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-api1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/players/AntVenom/avatar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Minecraft Bedrock Versions
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Minecraft Bedrock Edition versions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-api1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/servers/versions/bedrock"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Minecraft Status
api_list.description: Get Minecraft Status if it's up or down, the uptime percentage, total downtime as well as incident count in the last 3 months
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-api1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mojang/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
